allFeatures.name: Unarmored Defense
allFeatures.description: While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

allFeatures.name: Martial Arts
allFeatures.description: At 1st level, your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons.

allFeatures.name: Ki
allFeatures.description: Starting at 2nd level, your training allows you to harness the mystic energy of ki.

allFeatures.name: Unarmored Movement
allFeatures.description: Starting at 2nd level, your speed increases by 10 feet while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield.

allFeatures.name: Monastic Tradition
allFeatures.description: When you reach 3rd level, you commit yourself to a monastic tradition.

allFeatures.name: Deflect Missiles
allFeatures.description: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your reaction to deflect or catch the missile when you are hit by a ranged weapon attack.
